name: Divine Souls F2P MMO
description: Real-time combat combos, action RPG, and dungeon instances combine beautifully to form Divine Souls. Play alone or form a party with friends and strangers to slice, grab, combo, and clear enemy minions on your way to dungeon bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Single-Core 2.4 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7 Series or equivalent or later DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Dual-Core 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8 Series or equivalent or Later DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is awesome because of how the RPG and some repeating quest it also challenges me by making leveling up hard.
i enjoy this game fun to play i think animators did a good job so i love this game!!!!!
Great action i found in this game, really recommend ' Divine Souls ' the acting is a bit weird, but an awsome game.
Go and take the game,its a good one.

Pretty awesome game actually. I hate F2P usually themed games but this is pretty fun if you like hack and slash/rpg with tactical elements included then this is the game for you. Different and definitely not a high quality but for what it's worth still a good game.
Neat game, not for everyone. I may come back to it when its a bit more polished.

Awesome game, Great graphics and controls (Use a game pad for easier play) I havn't played much of the game so far but So far so good, its like a console game, the only thing i will fault is dungeons can become repetative, other than that brilliant :D

hi i just finished download this game and have encountered a problem. Everything was fine from log in and to the story mode. But when i start and select my character the game suddenly closed at loading interface. I tried so many times but failed... Can anyone help me? i know this is review section but im just hoping someone can help me w/ this problem. TIA :)

I couldn't follow the story since it every time i talked to that damn mage he would talk over himself while trying to explain the bloody story.  10/10 would talk to the mage again.  P.S - I love the opening cinematic, The narrator was simply godlike.

Dated visuals. Tutorial didn't work. Mamy character customization options look the same. Movement is too fast and control is sluggish. Had to navigate through about 7 menus and access about 4 different areas before being able to fight a small group of enemies... then had to navigate to another area.. (too much navigating/loading new areas). Gender locked classes, uninteresting classes. In total this seems to be a mediocre game not worth much time.
what was that horrible experience i had??? :'(

+nice combat combos -need to create account outside game, register button is buggy, in-game browser also not scale right -buggy tutorial right from the start (you don't need it anyway, just skip) -redundant quests, go back & forth just to know npc (u won't read it anyway) -messy onscreen tips -buggy quest too, you may need to return to dungeon few times just to complete the same quest & sometime unable to complete the quest -animations kinda chunky, pls add frames & make it smooth -confusing & buggy world map -auto-navigation also not smart enough, easily blocked by random obstacles -poor cutscene (not so important anyway) -easy lost target, at least put soft lock  the game feels incomplete...
Wasted 2 hours updating drivers and reading forums and the POS still says it cant find Physxloader.dll, not worth my time now. Plenty more games out there to play!
Outspark use to own this. Even fiesta. But those games are trash.
in a nutshell this is a unfinished carbon copy of dragon nest rather go play that
this isn't dark souls
It's boring, has super slow gameplay, and it crashes every few minutes.

1. Mediocre graphics 2. Horrible engrish translations that are a puzzle themselves  3. Voice acting is monotone and emotionless ( strangely these actors spoke with no accent at all and sentences were properly formed. The actors knew english they just didn't know how to act; should have hired them to proof read the translations instead. )  4. Quests often don't update and have to be abandoned & restarted 5. The community is non-existant.

The narrative of the game was horrible. The create a character was just changing the color slightly and a bit of the hair style, but nothing to really differentiate yourself from others. It's not really a game I would play again nor recommend, but I am sure there are those who would enjoy it. Good luck to those that do.
Not that interesting
The in game audio appears to have been recorded in a category five hurricame.

This is you typical Hack and Slash grind MMO, it doesn't seem like they put much passion into the game and from the way the things are layed out it doesn't sugest much.    character classes are gender locked , very little custimisation of character available which is esentialy a few colour changes of certain pieces of clothing in 4 spots an a coupe of presets.  I really wanted to like this game and tried to, but sadly could not as it got boring real fast. The story is mediocre, and vague at most, graphics and voice acting is not that great either.

ok let me make this clear this game should not be in beta it has several lets call them reiterations and none of them has worked its still has tons of problems and the tutorial is god awfull its saveing grace is the helpscreen it dosent even tell you to hit alt in the begining to get rid of the mouse so you can actualy start the tutorial and play the game.....thats fine the worst part tho even worse than gender locked classes the horrible voice acting that sounds like google text to speech and the what looks and sounds like barely translated text because nothing makes any kind of sence....nothing tho is worse than the buggy as hell combat....if you want a game that is better in every meaning of the word go play dragon nest....or vindictus...or even rift....all in all i give this game a 2/10 i gave them an extra point for trying.  ill take another look at this when they get rid of the stamina bar that has no reason to be there with so few players.

It is with displeasure that I do not recommend this game because it has the foundations of what could be alot of fun, however it is incredibly boring trying to perform combos on monsters that often do not recieve your attacks even though you see your weapon clearly hit them and incredibly poor graphics for 2015, I reached level 15 and then played for a further three days, trying to immerse myself in the game; but with the buggy gameplay at the moment I found it hard to stay amused. (I would add that the block function is completely useless as you are hit-stun for long enough after a block that you can't dodge the next attack)
